Language.name: cs
Language.Text:
Tak jak to vypadá?
Cesta dál je zablokovaná. Všude kameny, bariéry, stìny ...
Dobrá zpráva je, že jsem našel i nìjaké výbušniny, špatná, že jich je zoufale málo.
Budeme tedy opatrnì volit místo, kde je odpálíme.

Language.name: en
Language.Text:
So, what's it look like?
The path ahead is blocked. Stones, barriers, walls all over ...
The good news is that I also found some explosives, bad news is that there is desperately not enough of them.
Then we have to carefully select the points, where we set them off.
